info.name: KCS Analytics & Academic API
info.description: Comprehensive analytics APIs including Admin Course Analytics and Student Academic View for the KCS platform.

item.name: Student Academic View

request.description:
Get comprehensive academic view and analytics for the authenticated student.

Access: Student only

Returns:
- Student information
- Academic performance records
- Attendance statistics and trends
- Course enrollments and progress
- Assignment analytics
- Quiz performance
- Examination results
- Fee payment status
- Leave request history
- Overall analytics (health score, strengths, weaknesses, recommendations)

response.name: Success Response

variable.description: The ID of the student to get academic view for

request.description:
Get comprehensive academic view for a specific student.

Access: Admin, Teacher only

Returns the same comprehensive academic data as the student's own view, but accessible to administrators and teachers for monitoring and support purposes.

item.description: Student academic view and analytics endpoints for comprehensive student data aggregation.

item.name: Campus Analytics

request.description:
Get comprehensive analytics for all courses across the campus. Admin access only.

Returns:
- Overview statistics (total courses, enrollments, completion rates)
- Category breakdown
- Difficulty level analysis
- Top performing and underperforming courses
- Monthly enrollment and completion trends

response.name: Success Response

item.description: Campus-wide analytics endpoints for administrators to monitor overall course performance.

variable.description: The ID of the course to get analytics for

request.description:
Get comprehensive analytics for a specific course.

Access: Admin, Teacher (for own courses), Course Instructor

Returns:
- Course information
- Enrollment statistics
- Content statistics (sections, lectures, duration)
- Performance metrics (quiz scores, assignments, attendance)
- Engagement metrics (ratings, reviews, watch time)
- Certification data
- Student demographics
- Recommendations for improvement

response.name: Success Response

item.name: Instructor Analytics

variable.description: The ID of the instructor to get analytics for

request.description:
Get comprehensive analytics for a specific instructor's performance.

Access: Admin, Instructor (for own stats)

Returns:
- Instructor information
- Teaching statistics (courses taught, students, certificates)
- Performance metrics (ratings, completion rates, satisfaction)
- Course-by-course performance breakdown
- Student outcomes (quiz scores, assignments, attendance)
- Engagement statistics
- Strengths and areas for improvement

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Get analytics for the currently authenticated instructor's performance.

Access: Teacher/Instructor only

Returns the same structure as 'Get Instructor Analytics' but for the authenticated user.

response.name: Success Response

item.description: Analytics for instructor performance and teaching statistics.

item.name: Enrollment Trends

request.description:
Get enrollment trends and forecasting for courses across the campus.

Access: Admin only

Returns:
- Overall enrollment trends
- Month-by-month trend data
- Category-specific trends
- Top growing courses
- Seasonal patterns
- Future enrollment forecasts

response.name: Success Response

item.description: Enrollment trend analysis and forecasting endpoints.

item.name: Revenue Analytics

request.description:
Get comprehensive revenue analytics for courses.

Access: Admin only

Returns:
- Overall revenue statistics
- Revenue breakdown by course
- Revenue breakdown by category
- Monthly revenue trends
- Top revenue-generating courses
- Revenue forecasts
- Business insights and recommendations

response.name: Success Response

item.description: Revenue tracking and financial analytics endpoints.
